resume.text:
Alice Chen | Senior Full-Stack Engineer | alice@example.com | github.com/alicechen | San Francisco, CA

EXPERIENCE
TechCorp (2020-Present) - Senior Full-Stack Engineer
- Led development of microservices architecture serving 10M+ users
- Implemented real-time data streaming with WebSockets
- Mentored 5 junior engineers, conducted code reviews
- 40% reduction in API response time through optimization

StartupXYZ (2018-2020) - Full-Stack Engineer
- Built React frontend for SaaS platform with 50K+ users
- Designed PostgreSQL database schema for 100M+ records
- Implemented FastAPI backend with async/await patterns
- Created CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

WebDev Solutions (2016-2018) - Junior Developer
- Developed features using Django and React
- Maintained legacy codebase and refactored critical components
- Fixed 200+ bugs, achieved 95% test coverage

EDUCATION
UC Berkeley - B.S. in Computer Science (2016)
Relevant Coursework: Distributed Systems, Database Systems, Machine Learning

SKILLS
Languages: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL
Backend: FastAPI, Django, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis
Frontend: React, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, Redux
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, AWS
Other: LangChain, LangGraph, REST APIs, GraphQL

PROJECTS
- Multi-Agent Hiring System: Built AI-powered candidate evaluation with 7 specialized agents
- Real-Time Streaming Dashboard: WebSocket-based analytics platform
- Microservices Migration: Led team migrating monolith to microservices architecture

recent_projects.name: hiring-system-ai
recent_projects.description: Multi-agent AI system for automated candidate evaluation

recent_projects.name: real-time-analytics
recent_projects.description: Real-time data streaming and visualization platform

cover_letter.text:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Senior Full-Stack Engineer position at your company. With 8 years of experience building scalable web applications and leading engineering teams, I am confident in my ability to contribute significantly to your organization.

Throughout my career, I have demonstrated expertise in both frontend and backend development. At TechCorp, I led the development of a microservices architecture that now serves over 10 million users, while at StartupXYZ, I designed and implemented a PostgreSQL database handling 100 million records.

What excites me about this role is the opportunity to work on challenging technical problems while mentoring the next generation of engineers. I am particularly interested in your company's focus on innovative AI solutions and real-time data processing, areas where I have significant hands-on experience.

I am motivated by solving complex engineering challenges and creating systems that have real impact. My proven track record of optimizing performance (40% reduction in API response time), implementing CI/CD pipelines (60% faster deployments), and mentoring junior engineers makes me well-suited for a senior position.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience align with your team's needs.

Best regards,
Alice Chen

job_description.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
job_description.description: We're seeking a Senior Full-Stack Engineer to lead the development of our next-generation AI-powered hiring platform. You'll work on scalable backend systems and modern frontend applications while mentoring junior developers.
responsibilities: Design and implement RESTful APIs and microservices using Python/FastAPI
Build responsive web applications with React and modern JavaScript frameworks
Lead code reviews and establish best practices for the engineering team
Optimize database performance and implement caching strategies
Deploy and maintain applications on cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP)
Collaborate with product managers to define technical requirements
required_skills: RESTful API design and microservices architecture
